pullRequest.title: Minor cleanup in BulkImport
pullRequest.bodyText:
Remove exceptions from BulkImport and ConcurrentKeyExtentCache
internal classes that were declared but never thrown
Remove some unused code in findOverlappingTablets
Shorten a few lines that use lambdas

commit.message:
Minor cleanup in BulkImport

* Remove exceptions from BulkImport and ConcurrentKeyExtentCache
internal classes that were declared but never thrown
* Remove other unused variables
* Shorten a few lines that use lambdas

nodes.bodyText: I can't tell what this was trying to do, but clearly your change is equivalent to existing behavior if endRow was never assigned to anything other than null.
